title: Top 10 Bangkok Street Food Spots

caption.default: 🍜 Bangkok's best street food revealed! From Michelin-starred jay fai to hidden Chinatown gems. Our local guide to the tastiest and most authentic eats in the city! 🥟
caption.facebook:
🍜 TOP 10 BANGKOK STREET FOOD SPOTS! 🥟

Our insider guide to the best eats:

1️⃣ Jay Fai - Michelin star crab omelet
2️⃣ Chinatown Yaowarat - Late night feast
3️⃣ Saphan Phut Night Market - Local favorite
4️⃣ Wang Lang Market - Student prices
5️⃣ Victory Monument boat noodles

💡 Local tips:
• Best time: 6-10 PM
• Look for queues = quality
• Point & smile ordering works!
• Have small bills ready

📍 Full guide with maps & prices!
🔥 Save this for your Bangkok trip!

title: Top 10 Phuket Hotels with Best Views

caption.default: 🏨 Phuket's most stunning hotel views ranked! From cliffside infinity pools to beachfront luxury. Where to stay for those perfect sunset moments! 🌅
caption.facebook:
🏨 TOP 10 PHUKET HOTELS WITH INSANE VIEWS! 🌅

Wake up to paradise at these spots:

🥇 The Shore at Katathani - Adults only bliss
🥈 Paresa Resort - Cliffside infinity pools
🥉 Sri Panwa - Private pool villas
4️⃣ Trisara - Ultimate luxury hideaway
5️⃣ The Nai Harn - Beachfront perfection

✨ What to expect:
• Private pools with ocean views

• World-class spa treatments

title: Top 10 Chiang Mai Temples You Can't Miss

caption.default: 🛕 Chiang Mai's most sacred and beautiful temples revealed! From mountaintop pagodas to ancient ruins. Your spiritual journey through the Rose of the North! 🏔️
caption.facebook:
🛕 TOP 10 CHIANG MAI TEMPLES! 🏔️

Spiritual journey through the north:

1️⃣ Doi Suthep - Mountain guardian
2️⃣ Wat Chedi Luang - Ancient giant
3️⃣ Wat Phra Singh - Gold everywhere
4️⃣ Silver Temple - Unique art
5️⃣ Wat Umong - Forest tunnels

🕉️ Temple etiquette:
• Dress modestly (shoulders/knees)
• Remove shoes before entering
• Never point feet at Buddha
• Silent in prayer halls

⏰ Best time: Early morning
💰 Most are free (donations welcome)

📿 Full guide with history & maps!
caption.instagram:
🛕 CHIANG MAI TEMPLES 🏔️

Top 10 spiritual spots! 🇹🇭

1️⃣ Doi Suthep views
2️⃣ Wat Chedi Luang ruins
3️⃣ Silver Temple art

⏰ Go early = no crowds
👗 Dress code: Modest

caption.default: 🏝️ Escape the crowds! Thailand's best-kept beach secrets revealed. From secret coves to untouched islands, discover paradise without the tourists! 🤫
caption.facebook:
🏝️ TOP 10 HIDDEN BEACHES IN THAILAND! 🤫

Escape the crowds at these secret spots:

🥇 Bottle Beach, Koh Phangan - Boat only
🥈 Ao Wai, Koh Samet - Jungle trek reward
🥉 Freedom Beach, Phuket - Hidden paradise
4️⃣ Bamboo Bay, Koh Lanta - Peaceful perfection
5️⃣ Ao Sane, Phuket - Snorkeling heaven

🗺️ How to find them:
• Some need boat access
• Others require short hikes
• Best visited weekdays
• Bring your own supplies!

💎 These won't stay secret forever!
📸 Full guide with directions & tips!

title: Top 10 Thai Dishes for First-Timers

caption.default: 🍛 New to Thai food? Start here! Our beginner-friendly guide to Thailand's must-try dishes. From mild to wild, we'll help you order like a local! 🌶️
caption.facebook:
🍛 TOP 10 THAI DISHES FOR BEGINNERS! 🥢

First time trying Thai food? Start here:

1️⃣ Pad Thai - The safe classic
2️⃣ Massaman Curry - Mild & sweet
3️⃣ Tom Kha Gai - Coconut soup
4️⃣ Spring Rolls - Fresh or fried
5️⃣ Mango Sticky Rice - Best dessert

🌶️ Spice guide:
• Mai pet = Not spicy
• Pet nit noi = Little spicy
• Pet = Spicy (careful!)
• Pet mak = Very spicy 🔥

💡 Start mild, build tolerance!
🍴 Point at pictures if unsure

📖 Full guide with pronunciations!
caption.instagram:
🍛 THAI FOOD FOR BEGINNERS 🥢

Start your Thai food journey! 🇹🇭

✅ Mild starters:
• Pad Thai
• Massaman curry
• Spring rolls

🌶️ Say: 'Mai pet' = Not spicy!
💡 Build spice slowly

📍 Swipe for all 10! ➡️
